item.title: Europe's plan to use $105 billion of frozen Russian assets tantamount to war, says Russia's Medvedev
item.description: It follows fresh proposals by the European Commission to unlock $105 billion to support Ukraine.

item.title: Putin threatens Europe with war if it wants one, as Ukraine peace talks falter
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin doubled down on threats toward Europe ahead of peace talks with the U.S., saying Moscow was "ready" for war.
